Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: To configure fabric network for this setup, we need mutual TLS support in go Network launcher. As on today, this is not possible with go NL. FAB-15851

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: Surya asked me to hold on testing on this test case as there are some changes required in configtx.yaml. Also, he is performing the same test case. So for now keeping this test case on hold.

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: Surya executed this test case on July 13th build and observed everything is working as expected.
